data.title: A Poetry Showcase for Wayne F. Burke

data.text:
Bio: Wayne F. Burke’s poetry and prose has been widely published in print and online. He is author of eight full-length published poetry collections–most recently BLACK SUMMER, Spartan Press–and one short story collection (TURMOIL & Other Stories, Adelaide Press). He was born in a small milltown in the Berkshire Hills of western Massachusetts (USA) but has lived, for the past 35 years, in the central area of Vermont (USA). He is active on FaceBook

Rooming House
